main event: German military personnel observed a silver-colored unidentified object traveling at a high rate of speed over Berlin, Germany on January 23, 1954.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 20-30 feet in diameter and appeared to be twice the size of a normal jet fighter aircraft., It moved at a speed greatly in excess of any known aircraft., The observation lasted for approximately 3 minutes., The object maneuvered in both vertical and horizontal directions and seemed to hover for a few seconds., No exhaust trail or sound was reported during the sighting.
